title: Vance says Trump team is interviewing FBI leads, sparking questions about current head
shortDescription: J.D. Vance said in a now-deleted social media post that Trump's transition team is interviewing FBI director candidates.

title: Trump, as President-elect, now getting intel briefings about US threats
shortDescription: The Office of the Director of National Intelligence provides such briefings to all incoming Presidents.

title: Biden won't fight Congress on Ukraine aid before Trump takes office
shortDescription: President Joe Biden won't press Congress for Ukraine aid before he exits. The Pentagon is rushing to distribute billions before Trump enters office.

title: Prosecutors want Trump criminal sentencing delayed, oppose dismissal
shortDescription: Manhattan prosecutors recommended delaying President-elect Donald Trump's criminal hush money sentencing, but are still backing the case.

title: Trump and Musk plan to slash federal spending. A closer look at how.
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump wants Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy to cut $6 trillion from federal budget - but how?

title: Donald Trump picks Howard Lutnick as commerce secretary
shortDescription: The commerce secretary is a high-level Cabinet position charged with advising the president on matters related to job creation and economic growth.

title: Trump's criminal sentencing on hold as prosecutors face deadline
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's Nov. 26 sentencing hearing remains on hold as Manhattan prosecutors are due to weigh in on next steps Tuesday.

title: Trump to attend Starship test launch in Texas with SpaceX CEO Musk
shortDescription: Donald Trump's attendance at the launch would be the latest public appearance he and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk have made together since his reelection.

title: Putin issues nuclear warning as Ukraine uses long-range missiles
shortDescription: Putin lowered the bar for a nuclear attack after the US lifted a ban on Ukraine using long-range missiles. Ukraine carried out its first strike with the weapons.

title: Trump may expedite executions. Here's how Biden could stop him.
shortDescription: Advocacy groups are pressuring Biden to fulfill a campaign promise and prevent President-elect Trump from initiating another series of executions.

title: Who has Trump picked for his Cabinet so far? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump named Fox Business host and fellow former reality star Sean Duffy as his choice for Transportation secretary Monday. See the latest Cabinet picks.

title: Trump taps Fox host, former congressman for Transportation secretary
shortDescription: Trump said he's nominating Sean Duffy, a Fox host, former Wisconsin congressman and onetime "Real World" cast member, as Transportation secretary.

title: GA court cancels arguments over disqualifying Fani Willis from Trump case
shortDescription: The Georgia Court of Appeals on Monday canceled President-elect Donald Trumpâ€™s effort to disqualify Fulton County DA from election interference case

title: 2 women told House committee Matt Gaetz paid them for sex: lawyer
shortDescription: A lawyer who represented two women who testified before a House ethics committee said they testified Matt Gaetz paid them for sex, per media reports.

title: Biden misses G20 Summit photo in Brazil
shortDescription: President Joe Biden was noticeably absent when leaders at the G20 Summit in Brazil gathered for a group photo.

title: Who will Trump pick for treasury secretary? What to know about the candidates
shortDescription: The treasury secretary is a high-level Cabinet position charged with advising the president on matters related to financial, economic and tax policy.

title: Image of Biden in MAGA hat during Trump meeting is AI | Fact check
shortDescription: Experts and an AI-detection tool said the image is likely AI-generated.

title: Trump's FCC chair wants to ban TikTok, but 'accelerate' Musk's company
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump chose Brendan Carr to lead the FCC. A Project 2025 author, Carr wants to 'dismantle the censorship cartel,' ban TikTok.

title: Biden seeks $100 billion to aid recovery from hurricanes, other disasters
shortDescription: Joe Biden wants nearly $100 billion in emergency funding to help respond to a series of disasters that have stretched government resources thin.
